original: Pītisahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: pīti sahagatam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na pīti sahagataḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Sukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: sukha sahagatam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Upekkhāsahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na upekkhā sahagataḥ na kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Hetuyā ekavīsati, adhipatiyā ekavīsati …pe… avigate ekavīsati.
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsati adhipatiyā ekavīsati pe avigate ekavīsati
